about.hero_desc: We are not just a platform, we are the technical engine that transforms your business dreams into tangible reality through smart and innovative solutions.
about.story_title: Our Story and How We Started
about.story_p1: MdStore started with a simple idea: making e-commerce accessible to everyone. We noticed the difficulties merchants face in launching their websites, so we decided to build a comprehensive technical environment characterized by ease and power, to empower every project owner to reach global markets.
about.val1_desc: We always strive to provide the latest technical tools that exceed market expectations and make merchants' lives easier.
about.val2_desc: We deal with complete clarity with our partners in all fees, data, and services provided without any hidden costs.
about.val3_desc: Our goal is to give you full control over your data and business operations to build your own brand independently.

footer.description: The leading platform in North Africa and the Arab world to empower merchants to build their digital future with ease and security.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: At MdStore, we prioritize the privacy of your data and the security of your store. Here's how we protect your information.
privacy.collection_desc: We only collect data necessary to run your store, such as name, email, and payment information to ensure a smooth selling experience.
privacy.usage_desc: Your data is used to improve our services, process orders, and provide intelligent reports that help you make better business decisions.
privacy.protection_desc: We use advanced encryption technologies and global security standards to protect your data from any unauthorized access.
privacy.sharing_desc: We never sell your data. We only share it with trusted service providers (like payment gateways) to complete your business transactions.
privacy.updates_desc: We update this policy periodically to ensure compliance with the latest security standards.

terms.title: Terms of Use
terms.subtitle: By using the MdStore platform, you agree to abide by the following terms and rules to ensure a fair and secure business environment for everyone.
terms.account_desc: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account information and all activities that occur under it. The information provided must be accurate and up-to-date.
terms.payments_desc: Our services are subject to periodic subscription fees. All fees are transparent with no hidden costs, and are charged according to the plan you choose.
terms.content_desc: Using the platform to sell illegal goods or violate intellectual property rights is prohibited. We reserve the right to close any store that violates these laws.
terms.legal_desc: These terms are subject to and interpreted according to the applicable local laws in Algeria (Ouled Fayet), and any dispute arising is subject to the jurisdiction of local courts.
terms.important_note: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Your continued use of the platform after modifications constitutes your acceptance of the new terms.

cookies.title: Cookie Policy
cookies.subtitle: We use cookies to improve your experience, personalize content, and analyze traffic on our platform.
cookies.essential_desc: These cookies are required for the basic functions of the site such as login and securing the shopping cart. They cannot be disabled.
cookies.pref_desc: Allow the site to remember your preferences such as the language you are currently using (Arabic/English) and your time zone.
cookies.analytics_desc: Help us understand how merchants interact with MdStore, allowing us to develop more efficient selling tools.
cookies.manage_desc: You can manage or clear cookies through your browser settings at any time. Please note that disabling some may affect your platform experience.
